description: Detects keywords that could indicate clearing PowerShell history
name: Clear PowerShell History - PowerShell Module
query: ((Payload:*Set\-PSReadlineOption* AND Payload:*â€“HistorySaveStyle* AND Payload:*SaveNothing*) OR (Payload:*Set\-PSReadlineOption* AND Payload:*\-HistorySaveStyle* AND Payload:*SaveNothing*)) OR ((Payload:(*del* OR *Remove\-Item* OR *rm*)) AND Payload:*\(Get\-PSReadlineOption\).HistorySavePath*)
author: Ilyas Ochkov, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, Daniil Yugoslavskiy, oscd.community
